title: Brazil Money Supply M0
description: Money Supply M0 in Brazil increased to 398583.29 BRL Million in October from 393440.72 BRL Million in September of 2022. Money Supply M0 in Brazil averaged 60413.15 BRL Million from 1950 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 427958.21 BRL Million in July of 2021 and a record low of 0 BRL Million in February of 1950. Brazil Money Supply M0 is the most liquid measure of the money supply including coins and notes in circulation and other assets that are easily convertible into cash. Money Supply M0 and M1 are also known as narrow money. This page provides - Brazil Money Supply M0 - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Banco Central Do Brasil
